name: Subway Train Runner
description:
Subway Train Runner is an amazing girl runner in the subway and an addictive endless running game!

Help the guy to dodge the approaching trains and escape from the angry policeman.

If you love Subway Train Runner then this Subway Kids Endless running game is for you. Enjoy running and Help your loved beautiful girl bypass many obstacles on her Subway Endless Run game.

You can control the game with one finger The game play is very easy. when you swipe left or right, you can change the running path Also Drag up to make the girl jump over obstacles on the road, swiping down the princess can slide on the ground when there are high obstacles. for more protection, you can use the skateboard activate by double tapping to use the hover board from crashing. You can use the power-ups to facilitate the game more when the levels are difficult.
